document.full_text: burkina faso opposition parties on saturday demanded long-serving president blaise compaore step down, blaming him for provoking a wave of violence in the west african nation.
document.title: burkina opposition demand president step down
lines_and_colors: burkina faso opposition parties on saturday demanded long-serving president blaise compaore step down, blaming him for provoking a wave of violence in the west african nation.
